ForecastingÂ¶

Forecasting tools are differentiated from Analytics primarily in scope and rigor. Both types of tools can be either Stochastic or Mechanistic, however forecasting tools are more likely to be both Mechanistic and Deterministic. Within the context of REON.cc, the immediate application of forecasting tools will fall under the following categories:

  • Hydrologic Modeling

  • Hydraulic Modeling

  • Urban Stormwater Modeling
